summaries:
The document is an annual report (Form 10-K) for Oracle Corporation, a Delaware-incorporated company, filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on May 31, 2025. The report includes financial information for the fiscal year ending May 31, 2025.

Oracle Corporation is listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under the ticker symbol ORCL. The company has one class of common stock with a par value of $0.01 per share and has issued 3.125% senior notes due July 2025. As of May 31, 2025, the aggregate market value of the voting stock held by non-affiliates was $305,793,119,000 based on the closing sale price of common stock as reported by the NYSE on November 29, 2024. The number of shares of common stock outstanding as of June 13, 2025, is 2,808,833,000.

The report indicates that Oracle Corporation is a large accelerated filer and has filed all required reports for the preceding 12 months and for the past 90 days. The company has also complied with SEC rules regarding the filing of Interactive Data Files.

The document includes a reference to portions of the company's definitive proxy statement relating to its 2025 annual meeting of stockholders, which will be filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission within 120 days of the registrant’s fiscal year ended May 31, 2025. No errors were found in the financial statements of the company during the preceding period that required a recovery analysis of incentive-based compensation received by any of its executive officers. The report does not mention any significant discoveries, IP, operational processes, or key product information.
